## EuroBSDCon Foundation since Dec 28, 2011

### providing future conferences with:

- financial backing/responsibility
- registration and payment (likely new one around)
- provide online infrastructure
- sponsoring via established contacts
- advise based on previous experience
- help with visa matters / travel
- Paul Schenkeveld travel grant
